Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Set of arrow heads
Description: Set of arrow heads comprising sixteen elements. Seven fragments of arrow heads are relatively well preserved and thereby confirm their function. Each of these fragments is an axial crescent of carnelian fixed with resin, which was used as adhesive. This set also comprises nine carnelian crescents without resin.
